attributes.action: to allow mental health patients to have a say on a suitable coarse of treament
attributes.additional_details: To allow Aberdeen health board to allow mental health patients to have a say on what the course of  treatment should be best for the patient and what the patient feels they are able to take part in , i want someone in mental health care to take in to account a patients choice of treatment which they feel able to do rather than exclude a patient from any treatment which at the moment is the only other option
